00053 // ===========================================================================
00054 // method definitions
00055 // ===========================================================================
00056 OptionsLoader::OptionsLoader()
00057     : myError(false), myOptions(OptionsCont::getOptions()), myItem() {}
00058 
00059 
00060 OptionsLoader::~OptionsLoader() {}
00061 
00062 
00063 void OptionsLoader::startElement(const XMLCh* const name,
00064                                  AttributeList& attributes) {
00065     myItem = TplConvert<XMLCh>::_2str(name);
00066     for (int i = 0; i < (int) attributes.getLength(); i++) {
00067         std::string key = TplConvert<XMLCh>::_2str(attributes.getName(i));
00068         std::string value = TplConvert<XMLCh>::_2str(attributes.getValue(i));
00069         if (key == "value" || key == "v") {
00070             setValue(myItem, value);
00071            //Added by Hi-Iberia for debug purposes.
00072            //printf ("Value: %s\n", value.c_str());
00073         }
00074         // could give a hint here about unsupported attributes in configuration files
00075     }
00076     myValue = "";
00077     //Added by Hi-Iberia for debug purposes.
00078   // printf("Key: %s\n", myItem.c_str());
00079 }
00080 
00081 
00082 void OptionsLoader::setValue(const std::string& key,
00083                              std::string& value) {
00084     if (value.length() > 0) {
00085         try {
00086             if (!setSecure(key, value)) {
00087                 WRITE_ERROR("Could not set option '" + key + "' (probably defined twice).");
00088                 myError = true;
00089             }
00090         } catch (ProcessError& e) {
00091             WRITE_ERROR(e.what());
00092             myError = true;
00093         }
00094     }
00095 }
00096 
00097 
00098 void OptionsLoader::characters(const XMLCh* const chars,
00099                                const XERCES3_SIZE_t length) {
00100     myValue = myValue + TplConvert<XMLCh>::_2str(chars, (unsigned int) length);
00101 }
00102 
00103 
00104 bool
00105 OptionsLoader::setSecure(const std::string& name,
00106                          const std::string& value) const {
00107     if (myOptions.isWriteable(name)) {
00108         myOptions.set(name, value);
00109         return true;
00110     }
00111     return false;
00112 }
00113 
00114 
00115 void
00116 OptionsLoader::endElement(const XMLCh* const /*name*/) {
00117     if (myItem.length() == 0 || myValue.length() == 0) {
00118         return;
00119     }
00120     if (myValue.find_first_not_of("\n\t \a") == std::string::npos) {
00121         return;
00122     }
00123     setValue(myItem, myValue);
00124     myItem = "";
00125     myValue = "";
00126 }
00127 
00128 
00129 void
00130 OptionsLoader::warning(const SAXParseException& exception) {
00131     WRITE_WARNING(TplConvert<XMLCh>::_2str(exception.getMessage()));
00132     WRITE_WARNING(" (At line/column " \
00133                   + toString(exception.getLineNumber() + 1) + '/' \
00134                   + toString(exception.getColumnNumber()) + ").");
00135     myError = true;
00136 }
00137 
00138 
00139 void
00140 OptionsLoader::error(const SAXParseException& exception) {
00141     WRITE_ERROR(
00142         TplConvert<XMLCh>::_2str(exception.getMessage()));
00143     WRITE_ERROR(
00144         " (At line/column "
00145         + toString(exception.getLineNumber() + 1) + '/'
00146         + toString(exception.getColumnNumber()) + ").");
00147     myError = true;
00148 }
00149 
00150 
00151 void
00152 OptionsLoader::fatalError(const SAXParseException& exception) {
00153     WRITE_ERROR(
00154         TplConvert<XMLCh>::_2str(exception.getMessage()));
00155     WRITE_ERROR(
00156         " (At line/column "
00157         + toString(exception.getLineNumber() + 1) + '/'
00158         + toString(exception.getColumnNumber()) + ").");
00159     myError = true;
00160 }
00161 
00162 
00163 bool
00164 OptionsLoader::errorOccured() const {
00165     return myError;
00166 }
